name: LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/LEGO Indiana Jones 2 - The Adventure Continues/LEGOIndy2.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select GOG setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/LEGO Indiana Jones 2 - The Adventure Continues/LEGOIndy2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /NOCANCEL /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
